name: Astronaut's Journey
description:
A launcher game where you can fly to the moon. 

Controls: Arrow keys to balance. Space to launch, and change stages. (Don't forget the tiny lander stage!)

Made totally solo for Ludum Dare, 48hrs. Hopefully the "sacrifices must be made" theme comes through! Really proud of how the art design came out. So many things just "clicked" without needing to be overthought. 

Juicy Menus made with a library I'll be releasing properly very soon. Watch this space. Haha, space. God, I'm tired.
